# Class JsonData

JSON data for graph processing.

Handles JSON objects and strings with validation and parsing capabilities.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getData getJsonString getValueAsString isValid

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this JSON data.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### getData

  * getData(): any

Retrieves the JSON data as a JavaScript object.

#### Returns any

Parsed JavaScript object




### getJsonString

  * getJsonString(): string

Retrieves the JSON data as a string.

#### Returns string

JSON string




### getValueAsString

  * getValueAsString(): string

Retrieves the value as a string (for primitive JSON values).

#### Returns string

String representation of the JSON value




### isValid

  * isValid(): boolean

Checks if the JSON data is valid.

#### Returns boolean

True if valid, false otherwise




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
